structure.unit: LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GAS AND OTHER FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS

law.text: Upon being certified by the commissioner, the association in KRS 234.280(1) shall be fully authorized and empowered to hold a referendum among producers, suppliers, and retail marketers on the question of whether the industry shall levy upon itself an assessment for the purpose stated in KRS 234.270 to 234.302.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 506, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1998.
